ai-tha-ap65:1.2_0: I am a wheel, a sacred flame.
ai-tha-ap65:1.3_0: Pure as pure, they can’t find purification
ai-tha-ap65:1.4_0: to the true teaching and well-known.
ai-tha-ap65:2.3_0: Then they mounted the sal tree,
ai-tha-ap65:2.4_0: I was conceived in the womb.
ai-tha-ap65:3.1_0: Whoever has faith in the Realized One,
ai-tha-ap65:3.4_0: They don’t go to a bad place.
ai-tha-ap65:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap65:6.2_0: and then focus on one foot,
ai-tha-ap65:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap65:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jāsabha.
ai-tha-ap65:9.1_0: He is a third part of the senior monks.
